summary: Adds a new fortified town to Tamriel. Explore the depths of the town, uncover secrets from the past, find the hidden treasure that the town ancestors once owned.
descriptionHtml:
Enter the new town located near Riverwood, ( Your Neighbour is Anise) , notice that the whole town is not deserted, and you claim ownership of a house there. Explore to find notes about the house owner\'s treasure locations and areas around the place.

Once you find the Location of the Town, you will unlock the location on your map! ( Map Markers, Duhh )

This is a new mod, and probably one of my first working player home mods solo created.

Installation :

Put Textures, Meshes and .ESM file in your Skyrim/[b]Data[/b] Folder
When asked to merge, press \"Yes to All\". If asked to replace, also press \"Yes to All\". ( This is because I have used some Resources.

[b]Credits[/b]
Zimose - Me ( Author and Creator )
Stroti - Resource Pack [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36386/]( Stroti Manor )[/url]
Creation Kit
author: Zimose
